oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Big Nashville Spectacular at Montgomery Co. Fair (16907)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Blackwood Singers; Ruwe, Grover; Metal photoplates;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: One color window card (black on light brown) announcing the Big Nashville Spectacular featuring the Blackwood Singers, Kelly Leroux, Grover Ruwe, and Charlie Maverick at the Montgomery County Fair in Mount Ida, Arkansas on September 27. Poster features metal photoplates of the Blackwood Singers and Grover Ruwe. For additional information about this poster see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/40286.
